  3. Grid

Grid

Example We are using a 12 column responsive grid. This gives us the ability to support all screen sizes from widescreen to mobile device. We are using 5 breakpoints which allow us to make content display optimally for different viewports. The breakpoints are: lg : 1170px md : 992px sm : 768px xs : 480px xxs : 320px
col-lg-3 / col-md-3 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-3 / col-md-3 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-3 / col-md-3 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-3 / col-md-3 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-4 / col-md-4 / col-sm-4 / col-xs-12
col-lg-4 / col-md-4 / col-sm-4 / col-xs-12
col-lg-4 / col-md-4 / col-sm-4 / col-xs-12
col-lg-6 / col-md-6 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-6 / col-md-6 / col-sm-6 / col-xs-12
col-lg-8 / col-md-8 / col-sm-8 / col-xs-12
col-lg-4 / col-md-4 / col-sm-4 / col-xs-12
col-lg-12 / col-md-12 / col-sm-12 / col-xs-12

Usage notes

More information on Bootstrap's Grid system here > http://v4-alpha.getbootstrap.com/layout/grid/
